publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7926 Jackie Baillie: Save Three Village Libraries—That the Parliament notes that Argyll and Bute Council is proposing to close the village libraries of Cardross, Rosneath and Tarbert; considers that these facilities have an important educational and recreational role in their communities, providing valuable access to books, magazines and newspapers to people of all ages; believes that these local facilities actively encourage literacy and the uptake of reading among children and young people; considers these community and educational services important, and urges Argyll and Bute Council to find savings elsewhere to protect them. Supported by: Bill Butler*
S3M-7926 Save Three Village Libraries (lodged on 9 February 2011) Mary Mulligan*, Elaine Smith*, Elaine Murray*, Cathy Peattie*

S3M-7926 Jackie Baillie: Save Three Village Libraries—That the Parliament notes that Argyll and Bute Council is proposing to close the village libraries of Cardross, Rosneath and Tarbert; considers that these facilities have an important educational and recreational role in their communities, providing valuable access to books, magazines and newspapers to people of all ages; believes that these local facilities actively encourage literacy and the uptake of reading among children and young people; considers these community and educational services important, and urges Argyll and Bute Council to find savings elsewhere to protect them. Supported by: Bill Butler, Mary Mulligan, Elaine Smith, Elaine Murray, Cathy Peattie
